titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to increase the limitation amount applicable to contributions to candidates in Federal elections by individuals and to decrease the limitation amount applicable to contributions to such candidates by nonparty multicandidate political committees.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H5487)
Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

bill.summary: 05/24/1995--Introduced. Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to: (1) increase the limitation amount of contributions by individuals to candidates in Federal elections; and (2) decrease the limitation amount of contributions by nonparty multicandidate political committees to such candidates.
